30 states do not have explicit civil rights protections for LGBTQ Americans. The inconsistent patchwork of state laws leaves millions of people vulnerable to discrimination at work, at school, and in many other parts of their lives. That is why we must pass the #EqualityAct

The #EqualityAct is an historic opportunity to guarantee and expand civil rights protections for LGBTQ Americans and those facing sex-based discrimination across key areas of life, including education, health, and employment. https://twitter.com/EdLaborCmte/status/1115681739597328384 …
